CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT and leaves the room
MOT places CHI on the floor and sits down next to her . CHI is facing the camera
CHI looks at car briefly and then looks at door
MOT grabs little duck and squeezes it making squeaking noises . MOT moves duck along the floor then onto CHI's lap . MOT repeats this sequence twice
CHI tries to grab toy when duck is on her lap
CHI looks at toy in her hand . CHI looks at MOT
<bef> CHI looks around then looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI leans over and grabs clown . CHI pulls box slightly towards her
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer and looks at clown and starts playing with the clown's face
CHI looks at football in front of her
MOT begins to throw football to CHI then rolls football to CHI
CHI grabs football . <aft> CHI picks up football
it appears as though CHI is looking at the camera . she may be looking just underneath the camera
CHI continues to turn football around in her hands
MOT starts to reach hand out to grab truck but stops
<bef> MOT pushes the clown's head down in the box . MOT holds the head down with her finger . MOT puts jack+in+the+box down next to her
MOT pushes box closer to CHI . MOT lets go of her finger
<bef> MOT pushes the clown's head down in the box and holds it there with her finger
CHI leans over and starts playing with the jack+in+the+box .
<bef> CHI touches lid of jack+in+the+box and clown's head . CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer to her
MOT pulls back the top all the way so it is not in the way
MOT pushes on the clown's head with her finger as if to show CHI how to put it back in the box
CHI tries to put the clown back in the box
CHI closes the lid over the clown and then pushes it back in the box . She takes her hand out of the box and closes lid with both hands
CHI has both hands on the lid of the box
MOT turns box a little towards herself . MOT turns the crank on the jack+in+the+box which makes music when turned
MOT put her hands back in her lap
CHI tries to put the clown back in the box
CHI tries to put the clown back in the box several times/5tim: 12:25:00
CHI continues to try to put the clown back in the box
CHI continues to try to get the clown back in the box
CHI looks at the other toys in the room
CHI continues to try to get the clown back in the box and finally succeeds
CHI is holding the clown's head down
CHI looks around room . CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI raises hand a little bit
<$=1> CHI starts pushing the clown's head back and forth
CHI tries to close the lid while clown is up
<bef> CHI starts to push head down
CHI puts the clown back in the box and closes the top with both hands
CHI lifts lid and pushes the clown back into the box
CHI tries to open lid with her fingernails
CHI puts her hand on the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to open the lid with her fingers
<aft> MOT taps CHI's arm then puts her hands on her lap
CHI continues to play with the lid
CHI pulls the jack+in+the+box closer to her
MOT settles box down on floor
CHI bangs hands down on jack+in+the+box
MOT turns the crank and jack+in+the+box makes music
CHI starts to play with lid while MOT is turning crank
MOT stops turning the crank and puts her hands back in her lap
CHI lifts lid and clown pops out
CHI tries to put clown back in the box
CHI continues to try to get the clown back in the box
CHI continues to try to get the clown back in the box
CHI lets the clown pop up
CHI continues to try to get clown back in the box
CHI looks at MOT's lap then at jack+in+the+box
CHI raises jack+in+the+box off the floor and set it down again
MOT points at the clown's nose
CHI plays with the clown's face
<aft> CHI points to the clown's nose
CHI tries to put the clown back in the box
CHI continues to try to put the clown back in the box
CHI puts clown back in the box and closes top with both hands

g.ga: put clown back in the box

u.a: CHI tries to open lid with her fingertips . <aft> CHI touches crank
CHI starts playing with crank and then with the top
MOT turns the crank which makes music
CHI turns her head and looks at door
CHI hears the INV open the door
MOT turns her head and looks at door
INV explains about Small Scale Activity
INV enters room explains about the Forbidden Object task to MOT
MOT is sitting on a regular chair at the table with CHI in her lap . INV is sitting across from them holding the forbidden object
INV places the forbidden object on the table and sets it in motion
CHI looks at object then reaches out for it
MOT moves CHI's hand away from object
CHI reaches out for object and then touches it
MOT moves CHI's hand away from object
CHI looks at the necklace on the table
CHI is holds up necklace near forbidden object
CHI touches the forbidden object still holding necklace
MOT moves CHI's hand away from object
CHI starts playing with necklace with both hands in front of her
CHI turns head and looks at the door
somebody is knocking on a door outside
INV explains about four PCI boxes to MOT
CHI pulls herself up and hangs onto MOT
MOT puts one hand on the ball which is next to her to pick it up and the other one around CHI to support her
CHI tries to put right foot in MOT's lap
CHI puts right foot in MOT's lap
CHI is now standing in MOT's lap
MOT moves hand from ball to CHI back and pats her
MOT hugs CHI with both arms and rubs CHI back with her right arm
<$=1> MOT is hugging CHI and rubbing CHI's back
MOT is hugging child and patting CHI's back
MOT looks up at CHI holding around it with her one arm and patting her back
CHI moves her head to the left
MOT looks down and picks up ball
MOT holds ball up in front of CHI
CHI pushes ball away and turns her head the other way
MOT turns ball in her hand while looking at it
CHI jumps up and down in MOT's lap
MOT puts ball down on the floor next to her
CHI looks at pictures on the wall
MOT looks at ball then at CHI
CHI turns her head and looks at ball
MOT rolls the ball then catches it and rolls it back
MOT moves hand from ball to support child
<aft> MOT puts CHI down on the floor in front of her
MOT rolls ball towards CHI and touches CHI's stomach with it as if to give it to her
MOT picks up CHI and puts her in her lap holding her supporting her with one hand
MOT holds ball in front of CHI
CHI turns around so she can see the ball
MOT bounces ball once and looks at CHI
MOT bounces ball twice and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then suddenly turns towards the door
MOT is holding the ball in front of CHI
CHI is looking at the door
MOT moves the ball a little closer to CHI
CHI pushes ball away and sits on MOT's lap
MOT looks at ball then at CHI
CHI grabs on to MOT shoulders
CHI is fidgeting around on MOT's lap
MOT first attempts to bounce ball then stops
<bef> CHI turns head to the other side
CHI is looking over MOT's shoulder
CHI bounces a little bit on MOT's lap
CHI turns head to the opposite side of the ball
CHI turns head the other way
MOT holds ball up a little higher and looks at it
MOT gets up holding CHI on one arm and the ball in the other one
MOT starts opening the top PCI box
CHI looks at the PCI boxes
MOT sits down and places CHI in her lap
MOT holds towel up so it covers CHI's face
<bef> MOT pulls away the towel . MOT looks at CHI
MOT holds up towel to play peekaboo but then moves it away still holding it with one hand while she pats CHI's back with the other
CHI turns around and leans her face on MOT's front
MOT picks up CHI and lets her stand in her lap
MOT holds towel over her head
<bef> MOT pulls away towel and looks at CHI
CHI leans over to MOT and looks over her shoulder
MOT puts towel on floor and rearranges CHI in her lap so she is sitting down
MOT bounces legs up and down a couple of times and then holds towel up in front of her
CHI jerks her head down and grabs hold of MOT's sweater
CHI is lying on her back in MOT's lap with her legs up
MOT continues to rub CHI's stomach
CHI sits up brushing her face first against MOT's front
<aft> MOT holds towel up to play peekaboo
CHI lies back and puts her hand to her mouth
MOT puts towel away on floor
MOT lets CHI stand in her lap supporting her with both arms and hugs her
MOT rocks CHI back and forth in her arms
MOT continues to pat CHI's back
<bef> CHI turns around and is facing the camera . She puts her left index finger in her mouth
MOT begins to put CHI on floor
CHI seems to loose balance and sits down in MOT's lap
MOT lifts CHI up to a standing position and hugs her while patting her back with her left hand
MOT picks up towel and puts it halfway in her lap
MOT puts left hand back on CHI's back to support it
<bef> MOT turns her head to the left . She turns it back so she is looking right in front of her
<bef> MOT looks at CHI holding her a little bit out in front of her . MOT hugs CHI . <aft> MOT starts patting CHI on her back
MOT stops patting CHI's back and rocks her back and forth in her arms
<aft> MOT stops patting CHI's back and rearranges CHI so she is sitting down in her lap instead of on her arm
<bef> CHI puts right hand up to her mouth
MOT lifts CHI up to a standing position holding her a little bit out in front of her
MOT hugs CHI . <aft> MOT looks down and grabs towel
turns head and torso around to look at towel
MOT continues to fold the towel
MOT folds towel so it is folded on the middle
MOT holds towel up in front of her head as if she was going to play peekaboo again
CHI turns head away from camera leaning over MOT's shoulder
<bef> CHI loses footing in MOT's lap and both feet slide down on the floor while her chin bumps into MOT's shoulder
MOT picks up CHI and gets up still holding on to the towel and with CHI on her left arm
noises from opening a box are heard
<bef> MOT closes lid . MOT puts the box away
CHI looks at the CPI boxes
MOT starts opening the next box
MOT puts away lid and goes through the papers in the box .
MOT looks through the papers in the box
<bef> MOT finds a blank piece of paper and takes out a crayon . MOT grabs the lid of the box
MOT sits down on the floor with CHI on her arm and puts down lid and paper and crayon next to her then places CHI on the floor
CHI tries to crawl up in MOT's lap
<bef> MOT picks up CHI . MOT puts CHI in her lap
<bef> MOT picks up the crayon and the lid upon which she has put the piece of paper
MOT places the lid in front of CHI
MOT tries to place lid in front of CHI again and write on it
MOT gives up and puts lid down
MOT moves her head closer to CHI . <aft> MOT pats CHI's back
CHI turns around and grabs MOT's sweater crying into the shirt she has under it

INV suggests a juice break to calm CHI down . CHI cries hysterically on and off but eventually calms down . INV asks MOT to try the Paper and Crayon Activity again and continue with the Book Activity . INV leaves the room
MOT is sitting on the floor and CHI is sitting on her knees in her lap holding onto MOT's cardigan with both hands .
MOT picks up the crayon and holds it up next to CHI
CHI turns her head and looks at crayon
<aft> MOT rearranges paper on the lid
CHI follows crayon with her eyes
MOT starts to write Kristen on the paper with the crayon
MOT straightens the piece of paper
CHI reaches hand out to take crayon
CHI changes her mind and pulls away her hand
<aft> MOT starts writing on the lid with the crayon
MOT finishes up her writing . <aft> MOT looks up at CHI and holds crayon up in front of CHI
CHI looks down on MOT's writing
MOT puts crayon down on the lid and wraps both arms around CHI who is leaning her head on MOT's front
MOT reaches out for the juice bottle which is next to her
CHI stands up on her knees on MOT's lap
MOT puts the bottle down next to her . <aft> MOT picks up crayon
CHI slides down and is lying in MOT's lap on her stomach with her head touching MOT's front
MOT rubs CHI back with her right hand
<bef> CHI slides further down and her feet touch the floor . CHI sits on her knees on the floor with her torso in MOT's lap
MOT holds bottle in front of CHI's mouth and offers it to her
CHI lifts her head up and holds herself up by her hands which are planted in MOT's lap
CHI's mouth is wide open as she is trying to get air for another fit of crying
CHI moves head around to avoid bottle
MOT is trying to put the nipple of the bottle in CHI's mouth following CHI's head movements and finally succeeds
MOT is shaking the bottle a little bit to make CHI drink
<bef> MOT puts bottle down next to her . <aft> MOT rubs CHI's back with both hands then grabs the crayon with one hand while she continues to rub CHI's back with the other
MOT holds crayon up in front of CHI
MOT pushes the lid so it is in front of her and starts writing on it
MOT finishes her writing then moves her hand to her lap and looks at CHI
CHI leans her head against MOT's front
MOT rubs CHI's back with her left hand
<bef> MOT puts crayon down on lid . MOT changes her mind and picks it up again
End of PCI - Paper and Crayon
